content: 给小朋友的话这个学期，Tony和Jenny带着从来没去过学校的Gogo 一起去上课。无比兴奋的Gogo对学校里的一切都感到非常新鲜，在同学们的帮助下认识课室、在课余时间一起分享自己的兴趣爱好，安排周末的时间，还学会了乘坐交通工具。另外，请大家猜一猜，搬进新房子的Tony一家，将会迎来怎样一种新气象呢？ Do you know How many words do you know? Strawberry, pear, shirt, sock, black, white. Good! You have 6 marks. , , , , , , Look at the picture and say the things you see.

content:
66 Culture 2: Holiday Plans 1 Look and read. 2 Read , write , and say. Xiaoying: Good morning. I speak to Paul , please? Paul: . Xiaoying: Hello , Paul. This is Xiaoying. are you? Paul: Hi , Xiaoying. I’m fine , thank you. Danny: Hello. May I speak to Janice , please? Janice: Speaking. Danny: Hi , Janice. This is Danny. How are you? Janice: Hi , Danny. I’m fine , thanks. What Speaking the Great Wall How Bei ing May 
67 What Speaking the Great Wall How Bei ing May Danny: Christmas holiday is coming. I’m going to visit London with my family. Janice: Great! What do you want to do there? Danny: I want to look at the Big Ben. I want to go on the London Eye , too! Xiaoying: The winter holiday is coming. I’m going to visit with my family. Paul: Cool! do you want to do there? Xiaoying: I want to look at the Bird’s Nest. I want to go on , too!

content: 72 Unit 1 Practice 1 1.—What subjects do you like? —I like music and art. 2.—Do you like science? —No, I don ’ t like science. 3.—Do you like music? —Yes, I do. I like music. 4.—Do you like English? —Yes, I do. I like English and art. Practice 2 They ’ re talking about the subjects they like. 1. —Do you like English? —Yes, I do. 2. Do you like ...？ No，I don ’ t. 3. What subjects do you like? 4. I like P.E. and math. Unit 2 Practice 1 1.—What are you doing? —I ’ m playing basketball. 2.We ’ re eating. 3.—What ’ s she doing? —She ’ s studying. 4.—What are they doing? —They ’ re painting. Practice 2 Gogo and Jenny are talking outside the Children ’ s Palace. Example: Gogo: What are they doing? Jenny: They ’ re painting. Unit 3 Practice 1 1.—What day is it today? —It ’ s Wednesday. 2.Let ’ s play ping-pong. 3.—What do you do on Thursday? —I play soccer on Thursday. 4.—Do you play baseball on Monday? — No, I don ’ t. I play baseball on Friday.

content: 74 Practice 2 Gogo and Tony are in the school club. Tony: Is he coloring? Gogo: No, he isn ’ t. He ’ s cutting. Tony: What is she doing? Gogo: She ’ s exercising. Tony: Is she dancing? Gogo: Yes, she is. Tony: Are they playing? Gogo: No, they aren ’ t. They ’ re talking. Unit 8 Practice 1 1. —What is she doing? —She ’ s folding the clothes. 2. —Is he washing the dishes? —Yes, he is. 3. She ’ s cleaning the windows. 4. —Is he sweeping the floor? — No, he isn ’ t. He ’ s cleaning the desk. Practice 2 Today is Sunday. Everyone is busy at home. Boomer: Is Dad cleaning the windows? Gogo: No, he isn ’ t. Boomer: What ’ s he doing? Gogo: He ’ s sweeping the floor. Review 2 1.A.Are they playing? B.Is he touching his nose? C.Is she drawing? D.Is he sleeping? E.Is he singing? F.Is he sweeping the floor? 2.Touch your ears. Sweep the floor. Wash the dishes. Fold the clothes. Close your eyes. Clean the desk. Clean the windows. Open your mouth.

content: 79 Unit 1 Do you like... ? Yes , I do. No , I don’t. What subjects do you like? I like... and... Unit 2 What are you doing? I’m... What are they doing? They’re...? Close your... ! Unit 6 What do they want? They want... Does he/she want... ? No , he/she doesn’t. Do you want... ? Yes , please. Unit 7 Are you... ? No , I’m not. I’m... Is he/she... ? No , he/she isn’t. He’s/She’s... Unit 8 Is he/she... ? No , he/she isn’t. He’s/She’s... Are they... ? Yes , they are. / No, they aren’t. Structures and Expressions
